subtasks.name: Develop a Story Concept
subtasks.description: Define the core idea and themes of the story.

subtasks.name: Create an Outline
subtasks.description: Structure the narrative arc, including exposition, rising action, climax, and falling action.

subtasks.name: Style Guide Development
subtasks.description: Specify tone, voice, and stylistic elements (e.g., descriptive language, dialogue format).
subtasks.feedback_mechanisms: Review sessions with peers to align on style.

subtasks.name: Character Development
subtasks.description: Create detailed profiles for main and supporting characters.

subtasks.name: Drafting the Story
subtasks.description: Write the initial draft based on the outline.
subtasks.challenges: Staying motivated and managing writer's block.
subtasks.feedback_mechanisms: Beta readers to provide insights on the draft.

subtasks.name: Revising and Editing
subtasks.description: Polish the manuscript, focusing on language, grammar, and narrative coherence.
subtasks.feedback_mechanisms: Peer review or professional editor's input.

subtasks.name: Finalizing and Formatting
subtasks.description: Prepare the manuscript for publication or submission.
subtasks.feedback_mechanisms: Final checks can involve input from publishing experts.
